author: Simon Difford
description: Cognac works well in this fruit cup, rounding the other ingredients to present as a more harmonious blend when compared to the same recipe made with gin. However, it's more of a winter's cup, without the freshening edge expected of a summer's fruit cup.
name: Brandy Fruit Cup (Difford's Cup No.3)
recipeIngredient: 50 ml Cola (e.g. Coca Cola or Pepsi Cola)

recipeInstructions.text: Add a citrus slice and a couple of mint leaves from garnish before filling to brim with ice
